general.gigTitle: create a wordpress website design as a wordpress developer, or website builder

sellerCard.description: A WordPress website designer and developer with 5+ years of experience, I’ve worked with 50+ clients and designed over 100 WordPress sites locally. I specialize in custom design, responsive design, SEO optimization, feature integration, Figma to WordPress and Elementor design, custom WordPress development, and WooCommerce solutions. Whether you need to design, redesign, build, rebuild, clone, edit, fix, or revamp your WordPress website, I’m here to help. Your satisfaction is my top priority. Contact me today for a free consultation, and let’s create a WordPress and WooCommerce website!

description.content:
Looking for a skilled WordPress website designer to create, build, rebuild, clone, edit, fix bugs and errors or revamp your WordPress and WooCommerce site?


Look no further!


I'm a WordPress developer or website builder with over 5 years of experience. I've had the pleasure of working with over 50 clients and creating more than 100 WordPress and WooCommerce websites. My skill set includes custom and responsive design, SEO optimization, feature integration, as well as Figma-to-WordPress and Elementor design. 


Whether you are looking for a personal blog, a corporate site, or an e-commerce solution, I have the expertise to bring your vision to life.



My Gig Key Features:


  • ️Professional and Eye-catching WordPress Website Design
  • Fully Responsive design
  • Speed, Security and SEO optimized
  • Royalty Free Images
  • Optimized image slider, Popup and CTAs for high-conversion
  • Email Marketing Platforms connection (Mailchimp, Aweber etc)
  • Social Media Platforms integration
  • Easy to edit Page Builder




Why Me:


  • After-sale support
  • 100% satisfaction guaranteed
  • 24/7 friendly communication
  • Professional service at a fair price


Let's talk before you order!



Tags: WordPress website design, woocommerce

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to begin working?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You should have information about hosting and domain (If you don't have it, I can assist you).

questionsAndAnswers.question: What's your availability to begin?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'm ready to initiate the task as soon as the order is placed.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Could you provide examples of your past web design projects for review?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Certainly! Feel free to reach out to me, and I'll be happy to share live previews and URLs of my previous web design work upon request.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I have the ability to make changes to my website without technical expertise?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I'll share comprehensive video instructions with you after the project, empowering you to make changes to your website effortlessly, even without technical expertise.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you offer assistance in the future if needed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, absolutely. You'll receive 30 days of complimentary after-sale support, and there's an option for a lifetime paid service as well.

packageList.title: Basic WordPress Website Design
packageList.description: One Landing Page Design, Redesign or Clone + the Basic Setup of WordPress + Social Media Integration

packageList.title: Standard WordPress Website Design
packageList.description: Up to 5 Pages Responsive Design, Redesign + Blog + Speed Optimization + Basic SEO + Customization

packageList.title: Pro WordPress Website Design
packageList.description: Professional Website Design & Redesign Up to 8 Pages + WooCommerce Setup + Consultation

openGraph.title: create a wordpress website design as a wordpress developer, or website builder

reviews.comment: Thank you so much Bareera! The delivery was excellent and quite fast. Bareera is quite technically savvy and has excellent comprehension of English-- ideal to communicate with. The only thing I would recommend for her is that sometimes I would send bugs that needed to be resolved before we can complete the delivery, and she would ask me to do it myself (DNS on our domain, etc). I would reply that Bareera actually should be resolving this herself as it's part of the engagement: Bareera would ultimately understand and get it done, but really if I'm paying for this service she should be doing it. If proactiveness is increased, next time I will give 5/5 stars!

The work was exceptional. we came with a difficult example and they realized this in no time. reason why it took longer was because or the speed at our side. We will be back with a new job soon. If you need a perfect website, dont look futher!!

5 Star ***** Bareera & Hassan understood my requirements and explained in detail all the various steps that were required, they updated me on a regular basis, any questions i had during development, they would answer me right away.  exceptional coding skills that a previous developer was unable to do, Highly Recommended

I have ordered from Hassan multiple times now, and he has always been very responsive in messages and quick to implement feedback. He also took the time to explain any questions I had about my website so I could make adjustments in the future on my own. I would highly recommend working with Hassan. If I need any work done on a website in the future, I will order from him again.

I had issue with my wordpress website as I couldn't see the orders visibility, and Bareera was very kind for helping me resolving this issue within no time. She is professional, knowledgeable person. I would surely will work with her again.
